website_summaries.verdict: Although designed for noisy work sites, these may work well for third shift workers who want to block out street noise.
pros: Foam adjusts to fit one's unique ear canal, blocking out most noise
Easy to put in and stay in place
Dirt- and dust-resistant skin prevents build-up
Vibrant color helps others notice you are wearing them/may not hear them
cons: Some say they fall out of the ear rather easily

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and effective
customer_reviews.text: These work so well I almost couldn't believe it, they stay in your ear and are so comfortable and soft, and I am a side sleeper so I was worried about them squishing and hurting me but that isn't the case at all. These help me get into a deep sleep. You can kind of hear your own heartbeat with them in but it's soft and kind of soothing. Don't mind my cat in the pic :)
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Shepard

customer_reviews.title: USELESS. ABSOLUTELY USELESS
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give zero stars. These are like putting cotton balls in your ears. They keep falling out and provide absolutely no sound barrier. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: ESTACIA KIRKLAND

customer_reviews.title: like can’t wear apple earbuds small cause they hurt
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got small ear-holes haha, like can’t wear apple earbuds small cause they hurt. These fit and served their purpose, but not long after they started to feel uncomfortable and kind of hurting. I had to take them out and give my ears a break. I was taking a certification test and needed the quiet though so I put them back in after a little bit. Just know if you are plagued with small ear holes like me you might not be the biggest fan of these.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey G

customer_reviews.title: Something changed
customer_reviews.text: Update: I woke up in the middle of the night because I can still hear things and came here to dock more stars off my review. I bought a package of these about a month before this order. The earbuds worked great and blocked out most noise. Then I ordered another pair and these feel different. They block out hardly any noise. They arrived in much cheaper packaging and even feel like they’re made from less material than the others I bought. I will say that these are more comfortable to sleep with than the originals, but that’s the only thing that’s been improved.
customer_reviews.author: BrandonArt

customer_reviews.title: THE VERY BEST EARPLUGS ON THE MARKET from my Perspective! :-)
customer_reviews.text: These Howard Leight Foam Earplugs are my ABSOLUTE FAVORITES for Noise Cancellation, Comfort & Price!!!! I have had the NOISIEST Neighbor and have had HUGE issues and even Health problems from sleep deprivation. So I am DESPERATE to find some Earplugs that REALLY WORKED. I have ordered NUMEROUS ones on Amazon and finally was blessed to find this Brand and this Specific Company and they are THE ONLY ONES THAT I WILL PURCHASE henceforth! ;-) I LOVVvvve them! Thanx Seller; Little Grey Rabbit, I LOVE your product and will continue to purchase it! I am A HIGHLY SATISFIED CUSTOMER! ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Cher McLane

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling on plane or basically anywhere
customer_reviews.text: I stayed at hostels in Spain and I wanted to make sure I slept well, I wore them at night so they could muffle the sound without just not hearing anything. If there is a loud noise you can hear it just in case of an emergency. I carried several since I washed a couple before throwing them away. they are easy to spot if you drop them. They are soft in the ear and just liked them. On the plane I wanted to sleep and a kid near by was crying, but it was fine after wearing these.
customer_reviews.author: AngelM

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, noise reducing earplugs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these after reading many reviews on earplugs and I am happy to say they lived up to their expectations. I purchased the earplugs to take my CPA exam after reading suggestions that the test center could be loud with others nearby. They worked wonderfully! Make sure you read the instructions here on Amazon on the product picture (mine didn't come with any) - it made a big difference! I will say that while they are almost perfect, you can still hear some muffled sounds while wearing them. Regardless 10/10 for my needs and will purchase more!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!  Too big for my ears
customer_reviews.text: These were way too large for my ear canal and very uncomfortable to me. Not happy with this purchase. Found some other much better for me and super comfortable silicone, moldable earplugs that just about block out noises so I can sleep at night in silence. I highly recommend silicone ear plugs if your ears are sensitive to the pressure of the foam plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lonie

customer_reviews.title: Great set of plugs
customer_reviews.text: I am a drummer and have extremely amplified hearing due to a disability and must have ear plugs in when playing. I tried several pairs of musician plugs, and none have the noise canceling capacity of these plugs. At 32db noise reduction, I can play my drums with no damage to my ears. They are also much less expensive than the other brands. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: lex

customer_reviews.title: Does not reduce sound
customer_reviews.text: I rarely give a low review however I had to with this product. These earplugs do not work. I am a light sleeper and needed something to reduce noise (husband snoring, birds chirping, dogs walking on hardwood floors). You can still hear all noises, so there is really no point in wearing these. I primarily purchased them so that I would not have to listen to hubby snoring and these are a fail. They do not even reduce the sound of him snoring. :/
customer_reviews.author: CoCo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and they work
customer_reviews.text: I got these to help block out snoring. They work fairly well and are comfortable. The foam easily conforms to the ear and eliminates all but the very loudest noises. I've been buying these for a few years after being given some as a welcome gift from a hotel in downtown Chicago. As promised, I didn't hear the city noises and slept great!
customer_reviews.author: Vol Fan

customer_reviews.title: Based on the reviews, I thought I was getting ...
customer_reviews.text: Based on the reviews, I thought I was getting some seriously quiet ear pluggs but sadly I went back to my old ones as these ones do not block out the sound as well. I am a nurse and work night shift so have to sleep during the day. I could still hear background noise with these. :(
customer_reviews.author: Summer Matsubara

customer_reviews.title: Great ear plugs
customer_reviews.text: I work nights and these work perfectly, canceling out the daytime noise from the rest of my family. I used each pair multiple times, without any breakdown, so I don’t think I’ll need to reorder any time soon, even though I definitely will once I need to. Best part is, I can still hear my alarm wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Nope. Still can hear the snoring.
customer_reviews.text: According to reviews I read, this earplug was going to give me A COMPLETE, UNINTERRUPTED BY SNORING NIGHT'S SLEEP. Wrong. Don't bother with them unless the noise your spouse is making is slightly above a natural breathing volume.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: These did not work for me. I still heard almost everything around me.
customer_reviews.author: EJFiction

customer_reviews.title: The best. They block out all sound and do not ...
customer_reviews.text: The best. They block out all sound and do not fall out of your ears during the night. I think the key is to roll them so they are compacted and then slide them into your ear so the wider end is almost flush with your ear opening. I will only use this brand from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Kim D.

customer_reviews.title: SUPER SOFT AND SUPER HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: I am replacing my old brand Flents Quiet Time for these. They are consistently made of the same quality and noise cancellation. Flents tends to send you a variety of different NRR and I’m not cool with their poor quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: There shall be peace again
customer_reviews.text: When ppl snore so hard you contemplate involuntary manslaughter because you might've finally snapped....these soft, comfortable little guys will save lives. And sanity.
customer_reviews.author: Dunyah

customer_reviews.title: Useless, keeps poping out the ears
customer_reviews.text: Not even worth trying! It barely stays in my ears. It keeps inflating and expanding inside my ear till it comes off. I have pretty medium to large ear holes. For my wife with smaller ears, it doesn’t even fit in. It does not keep the shape of your ear when you insert it. It just keeps expanding to get back to its initial shape.
customer_reviews.author: omid sassani

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I love how they fit in my ears. Extremely comfortable and cancel out about 90% of noise around me.
customer_reviews.author: Maritza I. Mar

customer_reviews.title: Work perfect..
customer_reviews.text: Our office has walls but they don't go all the way to the ceiling and noise travels badly. I cannot focus if one person is talking. So rather than go crazy I bought these little guys. Work perfect...people now come in my office making hand signals when they want to talk as they know when I have these in since they are so colorful, lol
customer_reviews.author: Eve Brock

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt block sound!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because my wife likes to watch TV when we go to bed....this does not block anything and also pops out of my ear...the free one American airlines give me work great
customer_reviews.author: pike513

customer_reviews.title: ... studying for the bar exam -- they do a good job of blocking out background noise
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these while studying for the bar exam -- they do a good job of blocking out background noise, and they don't hurt my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza Showers

customer_reviews.title: Beware vertigo
customer_reviews.text: Warning, if inserted too deeply can cause vertigo. These were very effective at blocking noise, but woke up with severe vertigo.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew R. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These work well for city noises at night. The reason I love them is that they are comfortable and fit my ears well. They don't feel like they are making my head explode.
customer_reviews.author: GoldencatQuill

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Said it would be 5 pairs. I only got five pieces or 2.5 pairs ...
customer_reviews.author: Toet2001

customer_reviews.title: They work - super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Definitely like these and have used them for some time now. They are VERY comfortable. Only wish they lasted longer as the 'expansion' foam eventually wears out after about 4-5 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: These ear plug work well (read the instructions on how ...
customer_reviews.text: These ear plug work well (read the instructions on how to use them) but do smell very strongly. That's not the biggest deal since they are going in ears not noses, but still a bit off-putting.
customer_reviews.author: Laura C. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly and durable too
customer_reviews.text: I use this when flying weekly red-eye flights from New Jersey to Seattle and back. Very comfortable. Works as advertised. Durable. Still in like-new condition after a total of 16 six-hour flights. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Matt in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Great brand
customer_reviews.text: I love these little earplugs. The best foam ones you can buy and I've tried them all. This is my go-to brand now. Comfy and last awhile. I'm a very light sleeper and these are the only ones I will use.
customer_reviews.author: valerie Olsowka

customer_reviews.title: Not the most sound blocking
customer_reviews.text: These earplugs are really comfortable and affordable but they do not block a lot of sound. If you are buying them for concerts or airplanes, they are great. But I can still hear snoring plain as day when trying to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They don't fit correctly in my ear, therefore, they don't eliminate noise.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Ear Plugs
customer_reviews.text: These are really easy to wear and block out sound great. i can no longer hear my bf snoring like a giant bear when I wear them. I give 4 star because they do fall out rather easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kymi Toliver

customer_reviews.title: They do not work
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions on these and they absolutely did not work. Did not block any noise at all. I could still hear my husband snoring, the heater, etc.. Total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Grandmapink

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly comfortable. I don't like the colors too much
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly comfortable. I don't like the colors too much, but it does make it easier to find. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Michi

customer_reviews.title: I could not get them to work. I watched ...
customer_reviews.text: I could not get them to work. I watched a few YouTube video videos on how to install them. No dice. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: ShawnyIsWake

customer_reviews.title: Great ear plugs, poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: These are great earplugs. I’ve used a variety of foam ear plugs and these are the softest and works well to block noise. Others I have used hurts my ear in the morning when I sleep with them in my ears. These don’t. One complaint is that these came in a bag that was not sealed. WhenI opened the box I only found 4 pairs instead of the stated 5 pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Sleep
customer_reviews.text: These help me get to sleep at night and block out enough of my husbands snoring.
customer_reviews.author: T W

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I have small ears and they don’t stay in. Plus I could still hear a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Benavides

customer_reviews.title: Best earplugs I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: [Almost!] blocks out my upstairs neighbors' 2-year old running across the hardwood for hours at a time and screaming at the top of his lungs. I owe my sanity and sleep to these earplugs. I ordered the small pack to try and Amazon mailed these in a big box (no fault to the manufacturer but what a waste of shipping materials!).
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for sleeping
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to sleep with due to sharing a hotel room with a notorious snorer. While I prefer of course jot wearing any ear plugs, these fit in my ears, did not close out all sound by a long shot, but did deaden the noise so I could sleep.
customer_reviews.author: CrossCountry

customer_reviews.title: THESE WORK GREAT I CAN BARELY HEAR ANYTHING WHEN I PUT THEM ...
customer_reviews.text: PURCHASED THESE BECAUSE MY HUSBAND SNORES SO LOUD AT NIGHT! THESE WORK GREAT I CAN BARELY HEAR ANYTHING WHEN I PUT THEM IN. LEAVES ME WITH A MUCH BETTER SLEEP. ALSO I REUSE THESE.
customer_reviews.author: Js1918

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: These little babies are comfortable and they do the job. I travel with a friend who snores, and these are the only earplugs that let me sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Mpls Janet

customer_reviews.title: Pointless
customer_reviews.text: These do absolutely nothing to block out any noise at all. It's truly amazing how useless they are.
customer_reviews.author: Emily S. Banks

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: They were knock off Howard Leight products. They work fine, but I would’ve preferred the actual product I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Work great for short periods of time
customer_reviews.text: I use these to sleep during the day because I’m a night shift nurse. They work great for the first 3ish hours then they get too warm and pliable and fall out of my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Willis

customer_reviews.title: Restful Sleep Achieved!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I took a chance on these ear plugs. I am a light sleeper and also have a snoring husband. The ear plugs are comfortable and very effective. I even slept through my alarm.
customer_reviews.author: C. Winslow

customer_reviews.title: CVS' is better than this
customer_reviews.text: has white powder on it. Also cannot keep its shape long, which makes it hard to insert. CVS' is better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Work Great
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable and really work when placed correctly. I personal open my jaw when putting them in to insure a secure fit. They do wear out so keep a new pair handy. Great product.

customer_reviews.title: Worthless!
customer_reviews.text: Big disappointment. These are worthless. They do not stay in your ear. They fall out within a few seconds, every time..

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Good shape and design. Love that it’s bright and easy to spot if I lose them. They don’t cancel out everything but they do a good job over all

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t help with blocking the noise out. I practically shoved them as deep as I could into my ear

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: We had some birds chirping outside our window throughout the night. These saved my life!

customer_reviews.title: What? I can’t hear you these work so well!
customer_reviews.text: Recommend by a friend who also does shift work. Blocks out fireworks close by too!

customer_reviews.title: Good value, performs as expected.
customer_reviews.text: These foam ear plugs fit well and worked as expected. My field test test was a 359 mile ride with two stops. Worked perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, highly recommend for sleep assistance due to noise
customer_reviews.text: These helped me sleep through the night like a baby after numerous sleepless nights caused by noise coming from my upstairs neighbors. Would highly recommend and will definitely be rebuying once they run out. Great for planes, hotels etc.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and effective

customer_reviews.title: Love these...

customer_reviews.title: Does not work at all

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the 5 pair and it only came with 3.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 5 pair pack and it only came with 3. Too cheap to return.

I watched a youtube clip on inserting these to make sure it was being done properly. Despite proper insertion, these sucked. I gave it 3 nights in a row but these turned out worse than other foam ones I've gotten at stores. Idk, maybe it's my ear canals aren't normal or something but what a waste. I'm glad I purchased the 5-pair pack and not the gigantic pack. I'm so sleep deprived from all the noise, desperate to find something that truly blocks out most of the noise.

product_meta.title: Howard Leight by Honeywell Laser Lite High Visibility Disposable Foam Earplugs, 5-Pair Vending Pack (LL-5)
product_meta.description:
Confirm at a glance that employees and colleagues are wearing ear protection with Howard Leight by Honeywell Laser Lite High Visibility Disposable Foam Earplugs. The yellow and magenta color scheme ensure these foam earplugs stand out, even across a busy shop floor. The contoured T-shape makes for easy insertion and removal, and the self-adjusting foam is designed to fit most ear canals. Workplace dirt buildup is inhibited by the soil-resistant, closed-cell foam skin. 5 pairs of disposable earplugs per vending pack.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Laser Lite uncorded foam earplugs, packaged in a compact Vending configuration. The vibrant colors of Laser Lite offer high visibility protection - while their contoured T-shape provides easy insertion and wear. Self-adjusting foam expands to fit virtually every wearer. Vending Packs offer improved accessibility of hearing protection items and work with a wide range of vending machine solutions. Earplugs are packaged in a resealable bag for convenient hygienic storage, and are packaged as a 5-pair pack to provide workers with a full week of hearing protection. These are also ideal for those who work off-site or frequently change out their earplugs. Each pack includes fitting instructions in English, French, and Spanish.
feature_bullets: LASER LITE HI-VIS COLORS: Vibrant yellow & magenta color is highly visible from a distance to help ensure employee compliance and hearing safety; it also helps prevent loss or misplacement
EXCELLENT NOISE REDUCTION (NRR 32): Self-Adjusting foam earplugs expand in the ear upon insertion to create a secure seal for excellent hearing protection in loud workplaces and jobsites
IDEAL FOR SMALLER & LARGER EARS: Small size of earplug delivers optimal fit and ear protection for smaller ears, but low pressure foam expands to fit virtually any size ear and ear canal
COMFORT & HYGIENE: Contoured T-shape allows for easy insertion and removal; Smooth, soil-resistant, closed-cell foam skin helps prevent dirt build-up; 5 pairs of earplugs per vending pack
RECOMMENDED INDUSTRIES: farming, chemical, construction, law enforcement, manufacturing, military, mining, municipal, oil & gas, pharmaceutical, steel, metal, transportation
